version_description:
Speeded up importing of m3u by as much as 3x
Fixed occasional crash in TV Guide when selecting the last programme
Fixed occasional crash in Add Playlist Screen
Fixed occasional crash in Playlist Selection Screen
Fixed occasional crash when using Alternative Media Player and selecting internal subtitles
Fixed occasional crash when media has no FPS info available
